_meanings:
A spirituous liquor
distilled from the flowers of the
Kadamba tree; {#nizevya maDu mADavAH#} 
{#sarasamatra kAdaMbaraM#} <ls>Śi. 4. 66.</ls>,

{@--1@} A
spirituous liquor distilled from the
flowers of the {#kadaMba#} tree.

{@--3@} The fluid issuing from
the temples of a rutting elephant.

{@--4@} An epithet of Sarasvatī, the
goddess of learning.

{@--6@} The rain-water collected
into clefts or hollow places.
